chunk:
Be Green Bath & Body Pomegranate + White Tea Toner

Brand: Be Green Bath & Body

Category: Toners/Astringents
book: 0058-Be Green Bath & Body Pomegranate + White Tea Toner

chunk: Ingredients: Rosa Damascena (Rose) Hydrosol Water, Aqua (Distilled Water), Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Camellia Sinesis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Punica Grantum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Lactobacillus, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Propanediol, Ethylhexyl Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate.
book: 0058-Be Green Bath & Body Pomegranate + White Tea Toner

chunk: Directions: Cleanse skin before using. Moisten a cotton pad with a small amount of toner and apply to skin. For toners with a spray cap, CLOSE EYES and spritz 3-5 times on face. Follow with facial serum or moisturizer.
book: 0058-Be Green Bath & Body Pomegranate + White Tea Toner
